instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings (h1-h4) and 'Inter' for body text. Import them via Google Fonts in index.css.
Implement a 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard: Mix large summary cards (col-span-2) with smaller metric cards (col-span-1).
Use the specified color palette. Do NOT use default Tailwind colors directly; use the semantic names (primary, secondary, muted).
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states and focus rings for accessibility.
Use 'Recharts' for data visualization. Style the charts to match the theme (clean lines, no grid lines if possible, custom tooltips).
For the 'Data Upload' section, create a large, dashed-border drop zone that highlights on drag-over.
Keep the design 'Airy'. Use generous padding (p-6 or p-8) inside cards.
Do NOT use dark mode by default. The app is strictly Light Mode as per requirements.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.
For the sidebar, use a clean, vertical list with subtle hover effects (bg-slate-100).
Ensure the 'Data Cleaning' interface is intuitive: Use a table view with inline editing or clear action buttons for each column.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic: No generic centered layouts, no rainbow gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements (z-index, shadows).
Use glass-morphism effects sparingly (e.g., sticky headers).
Do NOT apply 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties (transform, opacity, colors).
Do NOT center align the app container globally.
Use modern button styles (pill or rounded-lg).

Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, active, focus).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
